Gelar Kongres, NasDem Tetapkan Ketum dan Bahas Kebijakan Strategis
06 Nov 2019, 19:09 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Gelar Kongres, NasDem Tetapkan Ketum dan Bahas Kebijakan Strategis

KBRN, Jakarta : Partai NasDem akan menggelar Kongres ke-II Partai NasDen sekaligus memperingati HUT ke-8 partai di JI Expo Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, pada 8-11 November 2019.Dalam kongres Partai NasDem, selain akan memilih Ketua Umum, juga akan membahas konsolidasi dan transformasi kepengurusan dan kebijakan strategis kepengurusan partai."Kongres ke-II merupakan satu event politik NasDem yang sangat strategis. Kongres dengan materi dasar menginginkan NasDem menjadi partai yang modern demi kemajuan demokrasi di Indonesia," kata Ketua Steering Committee (SC) Kongres ke-II Partai Nasdem, Johnny G Plate, Rabu (6/11/2019) di Auditorium DPP Partai NasDem, Gondangdia, Jakarta Pusat.Sekjen Partai NasDem itu mengakui, ada sejumlah agenda penting lainnya yang akan digelar selama kongres. Termasuk, adanya laporan pertanggungjawaban DPP NasDem."Pertama, akan ada laporan pertanggungjawaban DPP NasDem periode 2014-2019. Setelah itu baru masuk pemilihan sekaligus penetapan Ketua Umum 2019-2024," kata Johnny.Johnny mengatakan, Kongres ke-II NasDem tersebut akan mengambil tema 'Restorasi untuk Indonesia Maju'. Tema itu diambil karena sejalan dengan Kabinet Indonesia Maju yang dibentuk Presiden Joko Widodo."Ketua umum terpilih memiliki mandat penuh menyusun dan menetapkan kepengurusan NasDem dari tingkat pusat hingga daerah, mulai dari DPW di tingkat provinsi dan DPD di tingkat kabupaten kota," ujar Johnny.Dikatakan Johnny, ribuan kader yang ikut dalam kongres akan mengikuti seluruh rangkaian pengambilan keputusan strategis partai, baik di tingkat pleno maupun sidang-sidang komisi. "Diantaranya terkait dengan amandemen, adendum, penambahan, pengurangan, organisasi," ujar Menkominfo itu.Dijelaskan, posisi NasDem nantinya juga akan didorong menjadi partai modern sumber rekrutmen yang akan menyediakan politisi-politisi nasional pengkaderan politik nasional. Beberapa rancangan keputusan diantaranya juga adalah pemilihan dan penetapan Ketum NasDem periode 2019-2024 sebagaimana amanat AD-ART NasDem.Wakil Ketua SC Kongres ke-II Partai NasDem, Zulfan Lindan, mengakui, sampai dengan saat ini memang baru muncul nama Ketum Partai NasDem Surya Paloh. Namun demikian, Partai NasDem sendiri tidak menutup kemungkinan munculnya calon Ketum baru."Sampai sekarang ini nama Ketum yang muncul memang Ketum Surya Paloh. Tetapi kami membuka pintu jika masih ada yang ingin maju," kata Zulfan.Menjelang Kongres ke-II Partai NasDem, dikatakan Zulfan, sekitar 70 persen Dewan Perwakilan Daerah (DPD) masih percaya terhadap Surya Paloh. Pihak DPP pun nantinya akan membuka pintu kritik seluas-luasnya kepada DPD se-Indonesia. "70 persen DPD masih percaya (Surya Paloh). Kami juga memberikan suara seluas-luasnya kepada DPD untuk memberikan kritik," ucap Zulfan.Â Zulfan menjelaskan, Gubernur Anies akan membuka kongres dan akan memberikan sambutan. Namun demikian, NasDem juga mengundang kepala daerah lain seperti Gubernur Jawa Barat, Ridwan Kamil dan Gubernur Jawa Timur, Khofifah Indar Parawansa."Anies diundang dan akan memberikan sambutan selamat datang. Ini kan tuan rumah, yang punya tempat di DKI. Kami undang Khofifah, ada Ridwan Kamil juga," kata Zulfan.Ketua OC Kongres II yang juga Ketua DPP bidang Perempuan dan Anak, Amelia Anggraini, menjelaskan, dalam kongres ke-II NasDen, peserta yang sudah mendaftar saat ini sudah mencapai angka lebih dari 7.000 orang. Di dalam kongres pun, akan diundang Presiden Joko Widodo dan para Ketua Umum Parpol."Peserta 7000 orang yang sudah terdaftar. Presiden, Wapres dan Ketua Umum Parpol pun akan kami undang pada penutupan pada tanggal 11," kata Amelia Anggraini.Dijelaskan, pada pembukaan kongres ke-II NasDem rencananya tidak mengundang tokoh maupun pejabat partai politik. Hanya saja, NasDem mempercayakan pembukaan kongres kepada Gubernur DKI Anies Baswedan selaku tuan rumah.Dalam rangkaian kongres juga akan ada beberapa hal yang akan dibahas. Diantaranya selain pelaksanaan kongres juga ada pemaren UMKM binaan, workshop, pasar gagasan hingga exhibition agri maritim.

Degree of Congress, NasDem Decides the General Guidelines and Discusses Strategic Policies
Nov 6, 2019, 19:09 by Azis Zulkarnaen Handoyo


Degree of Congress, NasDem Decides the General Guidelines and Discusses Strategic Policies

KBRN, Jakarta: The NasDem Party will hold the Second Congress of the NasDen Party and at the same time commemorate the 8th anniversary of the party at the JI Expo Kemayoran, Central Jakarta, on 8-11 November 2019. In the congress the NasDem Party, in addition to electing the Chairperson, will also discuss "the second congress is a very strategic NasDem political event. Congress with basic materials wants NasDem to become a modern party for the advancement of democracy in Indonesia," the Chair of the Congressional Steering Committee (SC) told -II Nasdem Party, Johnny G Plate, Wednesday (6/11/2019) at the NasDem DPP Auditorium, Gondangdia, Central Jakarta. The NasDem Party General Secretary admitted that there were a number of other important agendas to be held during the congress. Including, the NasDem DPP accountability report. "First, there will be a NasDem DPP accountability report for the 2014-2019 period. After that, it will only be elected as well as determining the 2019-2024 General Chair," Johnny said. Johnny said, Nasdem's Second Congress will take the theme 'Restoration for Advanced Indonesia'. The theme was taken because it is in line with the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet formed by President Joko Widodo. "The elected general chairman has the full mandate to compile and determine NasDem management from the central to the regional level, starting from the DPW at the provincial level and the DPD at the municipal district level," Johnny said. Johnny said, thousands of cadres who participated in the congress will participate in the whole series of party strategic decision making, both at the plenary level and commission sessions. "Among them are related to amendments, addendums, additions, reductions, organizations," said the Minister of Communication and Information. Explained, NasDem's position will also be encouraged to become a modern party for recruitment sources that will provide national politicians with national political cadre. Some of the draft decisions also include the election and stipulation of the NasDem Ketum 2019-2024 period as mandated by the NasDem AD-ART. Deputy Chairperson of the NasDem Party's Second Congress, Zulfan Lindan, acknowledged that up to now the name of the Ketum Chairman of the NasDem Party Surya Paloh . However, the NasDem Party itself does not rule out the emergence of new Ketum candidates. "Until now the name Ketum that appears is Ketum Surya Paloh. But we open the door if there are still those who want to advance," said Zulfan. Ahead of the Second Congress of the NasDem Party, Zulfan said, about 70 percent of the Regional Representative Council (DPD) still believed in Surya Paloh. The DPP will later open the door to the broadest possible criticism for DPDs throughout Indonesia. "70 percent of DPD still believes (Surya Paloh). We also give the widest voice to the DPD to give criticism," said Zulfan. Zulfan explained, Governor Anies would open a congress and would give a speech. However, NasDem also invited other regional heads such as the Governor of West Java, Ridwan Kamil and the Governor of East Java, Khofifah Indar Parawansa. "Anies was invited and will give a welcome speech. This is the host, who has a place in DKI. We invite Khofifah, there is Ridwan Kamil as well, "said Zulfan. OC Chairman of the Second Congress who is also the Chairperson of the DPP for Women and Children, Amelia Anggraini, explained, in the NasDen II congress, participants who had registered at this time had reached more than 7,000 people. Even in the congress, President Joko Widodo and Political Party Chairmen will be invited. "7000 participants have already been registered. The President, Vice President and Political Party Chairperson will also be invited at the closing on the 11th," Amelia Anggraini said. NasDem's second congress planned not to invite political figures or officials. It's just that NasDem entrusted the opening of the congress to DKI Governor Anies Baswedan as the host. In the congress series there will also be a number of things that will be discussed. Among them besides the implementation of the congress there are also SMEs fostered, workshops, idea markets to maritime agri exhibition.
